message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $10000. I want to assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and is in excellent condition. However, I understand that you may have some doubts. I'm willing to take on all the risk, and if you're not satisfied with the product, you can simply return it to me. But I'm confident that you'll love it! What do you say?
Thank you for your offer and for taking on the risk. I appreciate your confidence in the product. Given the inspection and the price, I am willing to make the purchase.
